palette.description_primary: Warm, trustworthy blue - like a clear sky on a caring day
palette.description_secondary: Gentle sage green - calming and nurturing
palette.description_accent: Soft sandy orange - warm and approachable
palette.description_background_cool: Soft blue-white - clean but not sterile
palette.description_text_dark: Deep blue-grey - readable but softer than black

usage_guidelines.primary: Main brand color - use for headers, CTAs, and key elements
usage_guidelines.secondary: Supporting color - use for accents and highlights
usage_guidelines.accent: Sparingly for warmth - buttons, links, small highlights
usage_guidelines.backgrounds: Alternate warm/cool based on content mood
usage_guidelines.text: Dark text on light backgrounds, light text on dark backgrounds
usage_guidelines.accessibility: All color combinations meet WCAG AA contrast requirements
